basics.name: Anthony Ray, MPH
basics.label: Software Quality Analyst and Test Engineer
basics.authorization: Authorized to work in the US for any employer

work.name: The 05o Clinic
highlights: Supported fully-cloud API services providing lab and pathology resources.
Maintained high test planning and documentation standards.
Contributed to remote mob programming experiments.

work.name: AbsenceSoft
highlights: Conducted functional and regression testing for compliance-centric HR applications.
Researched and documented issues, supporting development efforts.
Contributed to refining Kanban and Scrum rituals.

work.name: Envision Technology Partners
highlights: Performed web UI test automation using Selenium/C# and scripted test cases using Specflow.
Created and maintained automation code using MS Visual Studio and TFS for source control.
Analyzed testing needs, collaborated with product leads, and provided test analytics using Power BI and Azure DevOps Rest API.
Supported manual test team through data generation, UI testing, and mentoring.

work.name: Corporate Compliance
highlights: Ensured compliance/regulatory support of enterprise clinical IT and billing systems.
Provided guidance to development, deployment, and leadership teams.
Managed efforts resulting from audits of enterprise systems.
Investigated and reported system issues to leadership.

work.name: Western Nephrology
highlights: Served as primary support for a 25-provider group nephrology practice.
Coordinated management of clinical/billing interfaces and ensured system uptime.
Configured/maintained user-facing and back-end components.
Provided guidance on privacy compliance, data analysis, and clinical reporting.
Managed company's internal SharePoint site and Microsoft Active Directory.

work.name: Various US Hospital Systems
highlights: Supported EMR/EHR implementations, coordinated classroom-style trainings, and provided on-site training.
Developed training materials and advised project coordinators on consultant deployment.
Provided technical guidance to training and clinical management.

work.name: The Hurricane Legal Center
highlights: Managed multiple databases, supported IT needs, and administered legal case management systems.
Developed advanced Excel-based workflows, managed user access, and improved processes.
Developed and managed document processing effort for high-volume litigation project.

work.name: Baptist Community Ministries - New Orleans, LA
highlights: Collaborated with the Program Evaluation division to support software vendor development.
Analyzed and migrated legacy data sources, advised on IT and information management needs.

work.name: Louisiana Public Health Institute - New Orleans, LA
highlights: Designed clinical reports and data-collection tools, analyzed disparate data sources.
Developed Office-based data-entry application and performed data request activities.

work.name: New Orleans BioInnovation Center - New Orleans, LA
highlights: Developed and deployed iPad-based questionnaires for regional biotech workforce analysis.
Managed data collection team, conducted statistical analysis, and summarized findings.

work.position: Data Collection Team Lead, Public Health Field Research
work.name: The Gulf Coast Child and Family Health Study - New Orleans, LA
highlights: Supported research to assess the impact of Hurricane Katrina on behavioral health resources.
Supervised data-collection operations, ensured data quality, and worked with community organizations.

work.name: Stella Worley Middle School
highlights: Middle School English & Computer Enrichment Instruction

work.name: LAKE CHARLES AMERICAN PRESS - Lake Charles, LA
highlights: Managed content/page design, health content, and opinion/insights section.

work.name: The Port Arthur News - Port Arthur, TX
